text: Associazione Calcio ChievoVerona was a football club which played in Italy. == Name == * 1929-1946 OND Chievo * 1946-1959 AC Chievo * 1959-1975 AC Cardi Chievo * 1975-1981 AC Chievo * 1981-1986 AC Paluani Chievo * 1986-1990 AC Chievo * 1990-2021 AC ChievoVerona == References == Category:Italian football clubs Category:1929 establishments in Italy Category:2021 disestablishments Category:Defunct football clubs Category:Verona
title: A.C. ChievoVerona
